item.title: Trump Wants Gaza Deal 'Straightened Out Over the Next Week'
item.description: President Donald Trump told reporters on Sunday that he hopes to get a ceasefire deal in Gaza "straightened out" within the next week.

item.title: Dem Suggests House Ethics Oversight on Old Members
item.description: A House Democrat is suggesting the House ethics office conduct reviews of fitness to serve for aging lawmakers.
